TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticPartialCachingControl extends System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl

summary.span: 表示为输出缓存指定并以声明方式包含在页或其他用户控件中的 类的实例。

span.span: Represents an instance of the class that is specified for output caching and included declaratively in a page or another user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用声明性 .ascx 文件中的指令或 用户控件的代码隐藏文件中的类为输出缓存指定用户控件时，将创建此类的实例。An instance of this class is created when a user control is specified for output caching, using either an directive in the declarative .ascx file, or the class in the user control's code-behind file. 如果用户控件在其包含页中以声明方式包含 (而不是使用 控件) 类中的方法进行动态加载 ，则该 实例将作为缓存用户控件的父级放置在页面的控件层次结构中。When the user control is included declaratively in its containing page (as opposed to being dynamically loaded using the method in the control class), the instance is placed in the control hierarchy of the page as a parent to the cached user control.

related.span: 缓存 ASP.NET 页面的部分

span.span: Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page

summary.span: 创建 对象，以包含缓存的服务器控件内容。

span.span: Creates the object to contain the cached server control content.

MemberSignature.Value: public StaticPartialCachingControl (string ctrlID, string guid, int duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom, System.Web.UI.BuildMethod buildMethod);

param.name: ctrlID
param.span: 由 ASP.NET 分配到服务器控件的标识符。

span.span: The identifier assigned to the server control by ASP.NET.

param.name: guid
param.span: 从服务器控件传递的全局唯一标识符。

span.span: The globally unique identifier passed from the server control.

param.name: duration
param.span: 服务器控件将在缓存中留存的时长。

span.span: The length of time the server control is to remain in the cache.

param.name: varyByParams
param.span: 查询字符串或窗体 POST 参数字符串，用以区分缓存中的用户控件。

span.span: A string of the query string or form POST parameters by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByControls
param.span: 服务器控件属性字符串，用以区分缓存中的用户控件。

span.span: A string of the server control properties by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByCustom
param.span: 含有自定义输出缓存参数值的用户定义的字符串。

span.span: A user-defined string that contains custom output-cache parameter values.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 一个委托，调用用于构建 的方法。

span.span: A delegate that calls the method to build the .

param.name: ctrlID
param.span: ASP.NET 向控件分配的 ID。

span.span: The ID that is assigned to the control by ASP.NET.

param.name: guid
param.span: 缓存控件的全局唯一标识符 (GUID)。

span.span: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the cached control.

param.name: duration
param.span: 对控件的输出进行缓存的时间长度。

span.span: The length of time that the control's output is cached.

param.name: varyByParams
param.span: 查询字符串或窗体 POST 参数字符串，用以区分缓存中的用户控件。

span.span: A string of the query string or form POST parameters by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByControls
param.span: 一个字符串，列出了用以区别缓存中的用户控件的服务器控件属性。

span.span: A string that lists the server-control properties by which to vary the user control in the cache.

param.name: varyByCustom
param.span: 含有自定义输出缓存参数值的用户定义的字符串。

span.span: A user-defined string that contains custom output-cache parameter values.

param.name: sqlDependency
param.span: 由分号分隔的字符串，指定用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: A semicolon-delimited string that specifies which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 调用控件生成方法的委托。

span.span: A delegate that calls the method that builds the control.

param.name: providerName
param.span: 用于存储输出缓存控件的提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the provider that is used to store the output-cached control.

summary.span: 为 .ascx 文件中定义的控件初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a control that is defined in an .ascx file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过声明方式或使用代码中的来指定控件的输出缓存提供程序 。You can specify an output-cache provider for a control, either declaratively or by using the in code.

summary.span: 在用户控件（.ascx 文件）中生成一个 对象，并将其添加到用作容器的服务器控件。

span.span: Builds a object in the user control (.ascx file) and adds it to the containing server control.

summary.span: 使用在用户控件（.ascx 文件）中指定的参数生成一个 对象，并将其作为已分析的子对象添加到用作容器的服务器控件。

span.span: Builds a object with the parameters specified in the user control (.ascx file) and adds it as a parsed sub-object to the containing server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法生成一个缓存控件，该控件与 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库表没有关系。The method builds a cached control with no relationship to a Microsoft SQL Server database table. 方法旨在供 ASP.NET 页框架使用，不应由开发人员直接调用。The method is intended for use by the ASP.NET page framework and should not be called directly by developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用与参数指定的 SQL Server 数据库表之间的关系生成缓存控件 `sqlDependency` 。The method builds a cached control with a relationship to a SQL Server database table specified by the `sqlDependency` parameter. 方法旨在供 ASP.NET 页框架使用，不应由开发人员直接调用。The method is intended for use by the ASP.NET page framework and should not be called directly by developers.
